name: Friend's Central Perk @ Ada's Discovery Cafe
description:
The Lounge by AT&T/Ada's Discovery Cafe in Capitol Hill has transformed into Central Perk, the iconic coffee shop from ‘90s TV show Friends, in celebration of the show’s 25th anniversary.

The Lounge, which opened last year in partnership with local coffee shop Ada’s Discovery Cafe, will be serving coffee drinks and menu items per usual, although they will be renamed to go along with the theme.

The Lounge is expected to remain transformed as Central Perk through the holidays.
